ygData.subject: RE: Gargoyle Island in OOT
ygData.msgSnippet: Same gypsy that drops the Lute of the Gypsy Princess drops the MM drum as the rare. Mynthi Davissi is her name, and the spelling is somewhat close to that :)
ygData.messageBody:
Same gypsy that drops the Lute of the Gypsy Princess drops the MM drum as
the rare.
Mynthi Davissi is her name, and the spelling is somewhat close to that :)


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: Thursday, February 17, 2000 11:52 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Gargoyle Island in OOT


From: "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>

By the way, what exactly drops the Mistmoore Drums? I was in that ballroom
with all the gypsys last night, got a Gypsy Lute and a Lute of the Gypsy
Princess... and almost got killed. I HATE Mistmoore but it has such great
stuff :) I am assuming the Lore one is for the quest?

Tani 17th Bardette
Halana 50th Shaman
Solusek Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Joshua R. Moore [mailto:josh@...]
Sent: Thursday, February 17, 2000 9:51 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Gargoyle Island in OOT


From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>

Heh, im still wearing the carapace, and BI arms. I did get lambent greaves,
and a mask. one vox bracer, BI crown, two +7 Cha +5 dex rings, charred
boots, bloodstained mantle,some stamina belt, a set of Mistmoore drums from
Shada (Worships shada) and now I have a ringmail cape=) but I am using 2
proc weapons now, Obsidian Shard, and Staff of Writhing.
Those seem to be a good combination, except in Sol a where the shard gets
resisted=)

-Martyn De'lantara
Mithaniel Marr 28 times cursed by the ding
-----Original Message-----
From: John Tatsukawa [mailto:jht@...]
Sent: Thursday, February 17, 2000 11:38 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Gargoyle Island in OOT


From: John Tatsukawa <jht@...>


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Joshua R. Moore [mailto:josh@...]
> Sent: Thursday, February 17, 2000 8:39 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Gargoyle Island in OOT
>
>
> From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>
>
> I sure as heck didnt have the best equipment in the world. At
> the time I had
> Black iron leggings, a basalt Carapace, Black Iron arms,
> bronze Bracers, elf
> hide gloves, raw hid cloak and bronze boots with some +3
> strength earrings

Lol. The elf hide gloves are much better than anything I had at the time.
And I didn't have the +3 STR earrings. I did have a pair of cutthroat rings
and maybe 1 magical earring, but I think it was a +3 CHA.

I only recently got the Carapace, but it's sitting in the bank waiting for
the day I get a gypsy lute. :-)

---Windleaf, 29th, Bertox
